name: javascript-zip-performance-compare
description: Compare the performance of front-end Javascript zip libraries

scripts.installzipjs: git clone https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/zip.js && rm -rf demo/zip.js && mv zip.js/WebContent/ demo/zip.js && rm -rf zip.js
scripts.postinstall: npm run installbenchmark && npm run installzipjs

author: bguiz
